sortId.Wiki: The ordering ID used to sort this part in the menu.

wanderingEquipId.Wiki: Replacement equipment ID for wandering ghosts.

vagrantItemLotId.Wiki: The item lot to use when this item is dropped and generates a vagrant.

vagrantBonusEneDropItemLotId.Wiki: The item lot to use when this item is dropped and generates a vagrant.

vagrantItemEneDropItemLotId.Wiki: The item lot to use when this item is dropped and generates a vagrant.

fixPrice.Wiki: Soul cost for repairing this item.

basicPrice.Wiki: Soul cost of reinforcement. See ShopLineupParam for shop prices.

sellValue.Wiki: The price when this item is sold. Determines the souls received when feeding this weapon to Frampt

residentSpEffectId.Wiki: A SpEffect applied when this part is equipped.

residentSpEffectId2.Wiki: A SpEffect applied when this part is equipped.

residentSpEffectId3.Wiki: A SpEffect applied when this part is equipped.

materialSetId.Wiki: The material requirements for improving this part.

partsDamageRate.Wiki: The damage correction to apply to this part when hit.

originEquipPro.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

originEquipPro1.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

originEquipPro2.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

originEquipPro3.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

originEquipPro4.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

originEquipPro5.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

originEquipPro6.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

originEquipPro7.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

originEquipPro8.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

originEquipPro9.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

originEquipPro10.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

originEquipPro11.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

originEquipPro12.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

originEquipPro13.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

originEquipPro14.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

originEquipPro15.Wiki: The source ID when this part is reinforced to this level.

faceScaleM_ScaleX.Wiki: The male face scaling factor for the X-axis.

faceScaleM_ScaleZ.Wiki: The male face scaling factor for the Z-axis.

faceScaleM_MaxX.Wiki: The maximum male face scaling factor for the X-axis.

faceScaleM_MaxZ.Wiki: The maximum male face scaling factor for the Z-axis.

faceScaleF_ScaleX.Wiki: The female face scaling factor for the X-axis.

faceScaleF_ScaleZ.Wiki: The female face scaling factor for the Z-axis.

faceScaleF_MaxX.Wiki: The maximum female face scaling factor for the X-axis.

faceScaleF_MaxZ.Wiki: The maximum female face scaling factor for the Z-axis.

qwcId.Wiki: The ID this item uses for world tendency.

equipModelId.Wiki: The model ID to use for this equipment.

iconIdM.Wiki: The icon ID to use for the male gender version.

iconIdF.Wiki: The icon ID to use for the male gender version.

knockBack.Wiki: The knockback reduction value for this equipment.

knockbackBounceRate.Wiki: The knockback repulsion value for this equipment.

durability.Wiki: The initial durability for this equipment.

durabilityMax.Wiki: The maximum durability for this equipment.

saDurability.Wiki: The poise durability for this equipment.

defFlickPower.Wiki: The weapon repulsion defense for this equipment.

defensePhysics.Wiki: The flat defense value for this equipment for the specified type.

defenseMagic.Wiki: The flat defense value for this equipment for the specified type.

defenseFire.Wiki: The flat defense value for this equipment for the specified type.

defenseThunder.Wiki: The flat defense value for this equipment for the specified type.

defenseSlash.Wiki: Percentage modifier to apply to physical defense when struck with slash damage. Example: -50 = -50%, 50 = +50%

defenseBlow.Wiki: Percentage modifier to apply to physical defense when struck with strike damage. Example: -50 = -50%, 50 = +50%

defenseThrust.Wiki: Percentage modifier to apply to physical defense when struck with thrust damage. Example: -50 = -50%, 50 = +50%

resistPoison.Wiki: The flat defense value for this equipment for the specified resistance type.

resistDisease.Wiki: The flat defense value for this equipment for the specified resistance type.

resistBlood.Wiki: The flat defense value for this equipment for the specified resistance type.

resistCurse.Wiki: The flat defense value for this equipment for the specified resistance type.

reinforceTypeId.Wiki: The reinforcement progression to use for this equipment.

trophySGradeId.Wiki: The achievement ID this part is associated with, if any.

shopLv.Wiki: Level that can be sold at the store

knockbackParamId.Wiki: The knockback parameters to use for this part.

flickDamageCutRate.Wiki: The absorption rate to use when calculating the repulsion damage this part incurs.

equipModelCategory.Wiki: The equipment model category used by this part.

protectorCategory.Wiki: The equipment category for this part.

partsDmgType.Wiki: The type of attack that applies parts damage.

defenseMaterial_Weak.AltName: Defense Presentation: Sound (on Weak Point Damage)
defenseMaterial_Weak.Wiki: The sound used when weak point is damaged.

defenseMaterialSfx_Weak.AltName: Defense Presentation: Particle (on Weak Point Damage)
defenseMaterialSfx_Weak.Wiki: The particles used when weak point is damaged.

isDeposit.Wiki: If ON, this item can be deposited into the repository.

headEquip.Wiki: If ON, is considered Helm equipment.

bodyEquip.Wiki: If ON, is considered Chest equipment.

armEquip.Wiki: If ON, is considered Gauntlet equipment.

legEquip.Wiki: If ON, is considered Legs equipment.

useFaceScale.Wiki: If ON, this part applies face scaling.

disableMultiDropShare.Wiki: If ON, this item cannot be dropped in a multiplayer session.

simpleModelForDlc.Wiki: If ON, there is a simple model for DLC.

oldSortId.Wiki: The ordering ID used to sort this part in the menu.
